meanings.definition: A person who is skilled in or enthusiastic about technology.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a real tekkie and can fix any computer issue.
meanings.sent2: The tekkie at the store helped me choose the best laptop for my needs.
meanings.sent3: The tekkie was so excited about the new software update, they threw a party!
meanings.sent4: She was a tekkie wizard, casting spells with lines of code.
meanings.sent5: In the land of technology, the tekkie was king.

meanings.definition: A type of casual footwear, typically made of canvas or synthetic materials.
meanings.sent1: I love wearing my tekkies to the beach because they are so comfortable.
meanings.sent2: Her tekkies were covered in sand after a day of playing volleyball.
meanings.sent3: The tekkie decided to wear sandals instead of their usual tekkies to the party.
meanings.sent4: His tekkies were like clouds for his feet, making each step a dream.
meanings.sent5: The tekkie squeaked on the polished floor, announcing his arrival.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of technology or technical expertise.
meanings.sent1: The tekkie conference showcased the latest gadgets and innovations.
meanings.sent2: Her tekkie skills were unmatched in the office.
meanings.sent3: The tekkie cat had a robotic toy that moved on its own.
meanings.sent4: The tekkie world was a maze of wires and circuits, waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: His tekkie mind could solve any digital puzzle thrown his way.
